title: 98x10: Eligibility of Interests in Qualified Incentive Stock Option Plan for Certificate of Divestiture
summary:
OGE denied a request for a Certificate of Divestiture where the stock was acquired through a qualified incentive stock option plan and the sale would not comply with the required holding period.  

Notes: [Note: In 2004, the Internal Revenue Code was amended and now the sale of stock acquired under these circumstances may qualify for a Certificate of Divestiture in accordance with 26 U.SC. § 421(d).]
